name: Bunny Run
description:
HELP!! Shadow is being chased by an Evil Bunny! You must guide her past the Evil Bunny's obstacles! In this endless runner you use Shadows excellent jumping to get past different obstacles.

This project is open for any comments, I would love to hear feedback good or bad on what to add or what to change. If you suggest something there is a strong possibility I can add it to the game, as long as it still fits the theme and style of the game. I am unable to accept donation on itch.io, but if you really would like to you can send money to my Venmo.

This game was made with Unity Game Engine

Art was made with PiskelApp

Music was Azure Water from PlayOnLoop.com

Sound Effects made from BFXR
